title: Alison Jackson Blasts to Sprint Victory at La Vuelta Femenina
content:
The 2023 Paris-Roubaix winner comes off superb lead from Kristen Faulkner to win in crash-marred finale: 'I came with a real fire to win this.'

Read the full article at Alison Jackson Blasts to Sprint Victory at La Vuelta Femenina on Velo.
author: ahood
